DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Honey Fructose : Glucose Mixtures
DOC.detailed_description: Eight health male volunteer study three time randomize order - Honey : volunteer feed weight-maintenance diet containg 5 % sugar , 20 % starch , 25 % acacia honey , 35 % fat 15 % protein 6 day ( day 1-6 ) ; On day 7 , plasma metabolite hormones concentration monitor 10 hour receive breakfast lunch contain honey ; day 8 , 75g oral glucose4 + 375 mg 13C-labelled glucose tolerance test , plasma glucose insulin concentration monitor 4 hour ; glucose kinetics measure 6,6 deuterated glucose - FG : volunteer feed weight-maintenance diet containg 5 % sugar , 20 % starch , 25 % fructose : glucose mixture match composition acacia honey , 35 % fat 15 % protein 6 day ( day 1-6 ) ; On day 7 , plasma metabolite hormones concentration monitor 10 hour receive breakfast lunch contain fructose glucose ; day 8 , 75g oral glucose + 375 mg 13C-labelled glucose tolerance test , plasma glucose insulin concentration monitor 4 hour ; glucose kinetics measure 6,6 deuterated glucose - Control : volunteer feed weight-maintenance diet containg 5 % sugar , 45 % starch , 35 % fat 15 % protein 6 day ( day 1-6 ) ; On day 7 , plasma metabolite hormones concentration monitor 10 hour receive breakfast lunch add sugar ; day 8 , 75g oral glucose + 375 mg 13C-labelled glucose tolerance test , plasma glucose insulin concentration monitor 4 hour ; glucose kinetics measure 6,6 deuterated glucose
DOC.criteria: health volunteer BMI < 19.5 BMI > 25 Smoker Any disease current treatment drug
